attributes.action: Increase the level of pay that Carers for the elderly or carers in general recieve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that it is a disgrace how people who work as carers only get, in majority of cases the minimum wage, when they are doing some jobs that most people would turn there noses upto, i.e. wiping someones bum, cleaning up vomit, if you agree please sign.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
